userComment: I like the idea of a shopping center on the way from downtown to Forest, but the traffic this would cause on the expressway should be a nonstarter
The left turn lane that would be required to gain access to the shopping center would turn the expressway into a boondoggle
I would love a Fresh Market in that area!
The point of having an expressway is to bypass traffic. It seems to me that this proposal would cause a significant amount of traffic.
This is another example of city council being in bed with the land developers to make a profit at the expense of taxpayers.
I think the proposal would bring much needed revenue to the Forest area.
